metadata.title: CVE-2019-13703 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in the Omnibox in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents ofthe Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
